column1: #Text=( (
#Text=WN
#Text=) )

#Text=Looking back on your experiences in Scientology , you describe several instances in the book where you considered leaving the organization or at least leaving the Sea Org - most notably when you were ordered into the " Rehabilitation Project Force " while you were pregnant . ( pp. 85-94 . )

column3:

column1: #Text=Why did you choose to stay ?
#Text=NM
#Text=:
#Text=I felt I had no choice but to stay , we had no non-scientology people in our lives to give us safety and help us get on our feet .
#Text=I was five months pregnant – who is going to give me a job .
#Text=And we literally had no money .
#Text=We had been with them as a group and only with them as a group for about a decade , you lose touch with family friends etc who are not scientologists .
#Text=If we left we would be put on the “ to be shunned list ” and none of our public Scientologists who had jobs for us could help us , without severe consequences to them .
#Text=The people who had left before us , they become non persons and you have no idea where they went .

#Text=I wanted to leave without being put on the shunning list , which we eventually were able to do , that allowed us to get help from other friends who had previously left the Sea Org , but not Scientology .
#Text=( (
#Text=WN
#Text=) )
#Text=In the appendix of the book you reference and discuss The Lucifer Effect by psychologist Philip Zimbardo .

#Text=You cite how " Zimbardo isolated 7 social processes that grease the slippery slope of evil , " and acknowledge , " I found myself in all of these seven steps , to a greater or lesser degree . ...

#Text=: The step for me was  Mindlessly taking the first step " , there was no internet back then .

column1: #Text=Books against Scientology had either been removed from the libraries or never been allowed to be printed .
#Text=The first class I took when I left Scientology was called " Critical Thinking " –
#Text=If I had taken that course PRIOR to Scientology , I doubt I would have mindlessly taken that first step .
#Text=Today we have the internet , which allows us free speech , and we now have a lot of free speech about Scientology –
#Text=They still try to " Steal the library books of the internet " , but funny , now that just makes more copies .
